definition: see 莎草[suo1 cao3]/see 摩莎[mo2 suo1]
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

pinyin: Wei1 lian2 · Sha1 shi4 bi3 ya4

sentences.english: Shakespeare do thellos, hellos wife, blame, call names Shakespeare is more fiercer, crueler.
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亞如許做，老婆叱罵莎士比亞更厲害了。

sentences.english: Shakespeare do thellos, hellos wife, blame, call names Shakespeare is more fiercer, crueler.
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亞如許做，老婆叱罵莎士比亞更厲害了。
莎士比亞的“付費圍牆”跟隨他走四方。

sentences.english: Remember to spend a day in Central Park watching a play by Shakespeare in the open air.
sentences.chinese: 記得花一天時間在中央公園露天看莎士比亞的戲劇。

sentences.english: Lily: An English production of Cymbeline by Shakespeare.
sentences.chinese: 英文版的莎士比亞名劇《辛白林》。

sentences.english: Ben jonson tells us that shakespeare never had to revise a manuscript.
sentences.chinese: 本瓊森告訴我們莎士比亞從來無須訂正手稿。

sentences.english: The BBC plans to televise all Shakespear's plays.
sentences.chinese: 英國廣播公司計劃播放莎士比亞的全部戲劇。

sentences.english: which is a line from one of Shakespeare plays.
sentences.chinese: 這是莎士比亞戲劇裏的一句臺詞。

sentences.english: You said it. No one can match Shakespeare in artistic talent.
sentences.chinese: 你說對了，就藝術才能而言沒人能與莎士比亞相比。

sentences.english: Shakespear wrote a lot of sonnets.
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亞寫了許多十四行詩。

sentences.english: Some of Shakespeare's comedies are ended by a marriage.
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亞的一些喜劇以有情人終成眷屬結束。

sentences.english: So that Shakespeare's own sovereignty will, Been a heavy Oppression.
sentences.chinese: 使莎士比亞的自我主權心志，遭到了綦重繁重榨取。

sentences.english: I chanced on a copy of the collection of Shakespeare's poems in the library.
sentences.chinese: 我在圖書館中偶然發現了一本莎士比亞詩集。

sentences.english: Shakespear is a writer whose output is enormous.
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亞是個作品豐富的作家。

sentences.english: All right, let's see the vote for Shakespeare again.
sentences.chinese: 好，我們再對莎士比亞投個票。

definition: Midsummer night's dream, comedy by William Shakespeare 莎士比亞|莎士比亚[Sha1 shi4 bi3 ya4]
Pang De (-219), general of Cao Wei at the start of the Three Kingdoms period, victor over Guan Yu 關羽|关羽/Pound (name)/Ezra Pound (1885-1972), American poet and translator
